settings.description:
Please read the terms & conditions carefully to ensure your entry is eligible.

We have outlined all the terms and conditions of our giveaway, please ensure you have read the eligibility and how to enter.

settings.heading: Helloskin Miss Dior Tote Bag Giveaway Terms and Conditions
settings.description: Shop, Glow, and Win! Celebrate the launch of our skincare range with a chance to win a Miss Dior Tote Bag worth $5,300 AUD. Shop now, and let your skin—and your luck—radiate beauty!

settings.text:
1.1. To be eligible for the Helloskin Miss Dior Tote Bag Giveaway, customers must:

  • Make a purchase of $80 AUD or more (excluding shipping) during the launch period, which consists of skincare products only.
  • Be subscribed to the Helloskin newsletter at the time of the draw.
  • Follow Helloskin on either Instagram (@Helloskin.com.au) or TikTok (@Helloskin.com.au).

1.2. Multiple purchases: Customers are allowed to make multiple qualifying purchases during the giveaway period, each of which will count as an additional entry into the draw.

settings.description:
2. Giveaway Period

2.1. The giveaway period begins on 17th / Sept / 2024 and ends approx 4 months later.

2.2. Helloskin reserves the right to extend the giveaway period if necessary. Any such extension will be communicated to participants via email and social media.

3. How to Enter

3.1. To enter the giveaway, participants must:

  • Make a qualifying purchase as outlined in section 1.1.
  • Ensure they are subscribed to the Helloskin newsletter and follow Helloskin on Instagram or TikTok.

3.2. Entries are automatically generated for each qualifying purchase, but participants must also complete the entry form to confirm their participation.

4. Draw and Selection of Winner

4.1. The winner will be selected randomly from all eligible entries based on their order number.

4.2. The draw will take place on or about when decided by Helloskin, and the winner will be announced via email and on Helloskin’s social media channels.

4.3. The winner will be contacted via the email address provided at the time of purchase and must respond within seven (7) days to claim their prize. Failure to respond within this period may result in forfeiture of the prize, and a new winner may be selected.

5. Prize

5.1. The prize is a Miss Dior Tote Bag valued at $5,300 AUD.

5.2. The prize is non-transferable, non-exchangeable, and cannot be redeemed for cash or other products.

5.3. Helloskin reserves the right to substitute the prize with an item of equal or greater value in the unlikely event that the original prize becomes unavailable.

6. General Conditions

6.1. By entering the giveaway, participants agree to these terms and conditions and to the use of their name, likeness, and entry details for promotional purposes without additional compensation, except where prohibited by law.

6.2. Helloskin reserves the right to disqualify any participant found to be in violation of these terms and conditions or engaging in fraudulent or deceptive practices.

6.3. Any personal information collected as part of the giveaway will be handled in accordance with Helloskin’s Privacy Policy.

7. Limitation of Liability

7.1. Helloskin is not responsible for any lost, late, misdirected, or incomplete entries due to technical or human error, including but not limited to failures in computer systems, software, or internet connections.

7.2. By participating in the giveaway, entrants agree to release, discharge, and hold harmless Helloskin and its affiliates, employees, and agents from any and all claims or liability arising out of or in connection with participation in the giveaway or the acceptance, use, or misuse of the prize.

8. Governing Law

8.1. These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Australia, and any disputes will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Australia.

Additional Information on the Giveaway

How to Increase Your Chances: Every qualifying purchase during the giveaway period counts as an additional entry. So, the more you shop, the better your chances of winning!

Follow Us for Updates: Stay connected by following us on Instagram and TikTok for the latest updates, product launches, and special offers.

settings.title: 30-Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.text: Not completely satisfied with our products or results? We're so confident in our products we provide a solid guarantee

settings.title: Free & Easy Returns.
settings.text: Our returns process is simple, just as it should be. Returns are covered by us, always

settings.title: Cruelty Free & Sustainable
settings.text: Our products are never tested on fluffy animals. We believe they need hugs not our products :) & we love our environment

settings.title: Australian Made & Owned
settings.text: We are proudly Australian Made & Owned. We truely believe the best skincare comes from our shores
